short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WE WILL HUNT THE BEST HIRES IN TOWN!
www.hirehunter.com.au helps you save money hiring your construction needs online!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are the world’s first aggregation platform for plant and equipment hire. HireHunter compares multiple vendors on one platform allowing you to browse based on product, timeline, and price.

Search by category or keyword
Seamlessly browse hundreds of products offered by our partners within HireHunter by category, refine searches and availability of product based on location, date and hire duration and get recommendations from various providers to make a hire.

Get rewarded for every hire
Users will be entitled to earn points for every hire made on our partner websites redirected from HireHunter. These points can redeem attractive rewards like gift vouchers and discounts.

A smart plugin that suggests alternative costs for the same product
With the chrome extension plugin, users will be notified of other partner sites carrying the same product with cost-saving alternatives in the process of browsing and making a hire.

Finding The Right Hire is Time Consuming
Often, if you’re working towards a deadline, the time to search for a hire that’s reliable, affordable, and available isn’t an option.

The Right Option is Never the First
In a market so fragmented and vast, finding a suitable hire isn’t always the first link you click on. The best deal may be buried under thousands of other hires. That’s why we Hunt you Hire!
